title: 'Mortgage costs right now are terrifying'
description: With rates rising and mortgages disappearing from the market, buyers reveal their struggles to get a deal.

title: Winning BGT would mean bigger house - Ghetto Kids
description: A group of Ugandan children is on the verge of glory after reaching the final of Britain's Got Talent.

title: Why are people leaving Russia, who are they, and where are they going?
description: A trickle of Russians leaving became a stream after the full-scale invasion of Ukraine of 2022.

title: Solar panels - an eco-disaster waiting to happen?
description: A French factory is pioneering recycling of solar units as experts warn of a waste mountain by 2050.

title: Can sci-fi films teach us anything about an AI threat?
description: Researchers have cited the plot of Pixar's WALL-E in a series of AI "disaster scenarios".

title: The Papers: Holly's 'speech on Phil' and PM 'wants tax cut'
description: Pre-election tax cuts and Holly Willoughby's return to This Morning feature in Sunday's papers.

title: The Memorial Tournament: Rory McIlroy moves into share of lead
description: Rory McIlroy has high hopes of a big win at The Memorial Tournament after a fine third round on Saturday.

title: Ukraine war: Twenty injured after Russian strike on Dnipro
description: Five of those hurt are children, of whom three are in a serious condition, a Ukrainian official says.

title: Man City have set the standard - how can Man Utd catch up?
description: Match of the Day pundit Alan Shearer says Manchester United will have to spend big this summer if they are to challenge Manchester City's supremacy.

title: Hospital armed siege turned me from BBC reporter to negotiator
description: BBC Reporter was asked to help after a patient held a doctor at gunpoint in 48-hour hospital siege.

title: Spanish Grand Prix: Lewis Hamilton and Fernando Alonso rue qualifying errors
description: Lewis Hamilton and Fernando Alonso say errors prevented them from joining Red Bull's Max Verstappen on the front row for the Spanish Grand Prix.

title: Ange Postecoglou coy on Celtic future after Scottish Cup triumph and domestic treble
description: The Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou says he wants to enjoy his side's Scottish Cup and domestic treble triumph rather than be "side-tracked" by talking about his future.

title: Watch highlights as Celtic beat Inverness CT to win the Scottish Cup
description: Celtic clinch a record eighth treble by beating Inverness Caledonian Thistle in the Scottish Cup final.

title: Ilkay Gundogan: Manchester City Pep Guardiola boss wants midfielder to stay
description: Pep Guardiola says Ilkay Gundogan signing a new contract would perfectly round off a historic season for Manchester City.

title: Man arrested at Wembley over '97' football shirt
description: The Met Police say a man has been held on suspicion of a public order offence and taken into custody.

title: Ben Stokes: England captain 'on course' to bowl in first Ashes Test
description: England captain Ben Stokes says he is "definitely on course" to bowl in the first Ashes Test at Edgbaston.

title: Alice Oseman: Heartstopper series two 'will be a little bit darker'
description: The YA writer says the next series will show her characters and their romances "maturing".

title: Kyogo Furuhashi gives Celtic the lead at Hampden in Scottish Cup final
description: Celtic's Kyogo Furuhashi nets the opener in the 2023 Scottish Cup final for Celtic.

title: French Open 2023: Aryna Sabalenka to face Sloane Stephens in Paris night session
description: Aryna Sabalenka will face Sloane Stephens in the first night session at this year's French Open to feature a women's match.

title: Barcelona come from 2-0 down to win second Champions League title
description: Barcelona win a second Women's Champions League title after coming from 2-0 behind to beat Wolfsburg 3-2 at the PSV Stadium in Eindhoven.

title: French Open 2023: Iga Swiatek earns double bagel at Roland Garros, Coco Gauff beats Mirra Andreeva
description: Iga Swiatek says she has to "remain disciplined" after thrashing Wang Xinyu, while Coco Gauff fights back to beat 16-year-old Mirra Andreeva.

title: England v Ireland highlights: England thrash spirited Ireland by 10 wickets
description: Watch highlights as England finally overcome a spirited fightback by Ireland to win the one-off Test at Lord's by 10 wickets.

title: FA Cup final: Manchester City 2-1 Manchester United highlights as Ilkay Gundogan scores twice
description: Watch highlights as Ilkay Gundogan scores twice to fire Manchester City to a 2-1 FA Cup final victory against Manchester United at Wembley.

title: England v Ireland: Mark Adair and Andrew McBrine make hosts wait for Lord's win
description: England finally overcome a spirited fightback by Ireland to win the one-off Test at Lord's by 10 wickets.

title: FA Cup final: Ilkay Gundogan strikes again to restore Man City's lead against Man Utd
description: Watch as Manchester City's captain Ilkay Gundogan strikes again to restore their lead against Manchester United in the FA Cup final at Wembley.

title: Spanish Grand Prix: Max Verstappen on pole after dramatic qualifying session
description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen takes pole position in a Spanish Grand Prix qualifying full of incident, including a collision between the Mercedes drivers.

title: FA Cup Final: Bruno Fernandes scores penalty for Man Utd after VAR spots Jack Grealish handball for Man City
description: Watch as Bruno Fernandes equalises from the penalty spot for Man Utd after VAR rules Manchester City's Jack Grealish handled in the box.

title: 'We can't be honest,' former home secretaries tell Kuenssberg on immigration
description: Five former home secretaries tell Laura Kuenssberg the truth about immigration policy.

title: England v Ireland: Tongue takes five wickets on debut
description: Watch Josh Tongue take five wickets against Ireland on his England Test debut at Lord's.

title: FA Cup final: Ilkay Gundogan scores stunning volley for Man City against Man Utd after 13 seconds
description: Watch as Ilkay Gundogan's long-range strike against Manchester United puts Manchester City ahead in the FA Cup final after just 13 seconds at Wembley.

title: India train accident: Modi vows punishments over deadly Odisha crash
description: At least 288 people were killed in the collision of two passenger trains and a goods train in Odisha.

title: Train strikes hit FA Cup final and Beyoncé concert
description: Drivers walk out over pay and conditions in the third rail strike this week.

title: Epsom Derby 2023: Auguste Rodin wins as Frankie Dettori denied farewell win on Arrest
description: Frankie Dettori is denied victory on Arrest in his final Derby as Auguste Rodin, ridden by Ryan Moore, wins the race on at Epsom.

title: Three Israeli soldiers killed near Egypt border
description: The incident came after a drug smuggling operation was thwarted at the border, the army says.

title: The Ashes: England name unchanged squad for first two Tests
description: England name an unchanged squad from the one-off Test against Ireland for the first two Tests of the Ashes.

title: England v Ireland: Ben Stokes winces after taking catch to dismiss Campher
description: England captain Ben Stokes looks in some discomfort after taking a catch at square leg to dismiss Ireland's Curtis Campher at Lord's.

title: Nineteen arrested ahead of Epsom Derby
description: Surrey Police say they have arrested 19 people "in connection with planned criminal disruption" at the Derby Festival on Saturday.

title: London Irish: Premiership club served winding-up petition by HMRC
description: Cash-strapped Premiership club London Irish are served a winding-up petition by HM Revenue & Customs over an unpaid tax bill.

title: England v Ireland: Jack Leach removes Lorcan Tucker
description: Jack Leach takes the first wicket of the third morning as England chase a quick victory over Ireland , Lorcan Tucker playing onto his stumps after making 44.

title: French Open 2023: Elena Rybakina withdraws from Roland Garros through illness
description: Wimbledon champion Elena Rybakina pulls out of the French Open shortly before her third-round match because of illness.

title: Bedworth: Two arrested after pensioner dies in dog attack
description: A woman in her 70s dies after she is attacked by a dog in Bedworth.

title: Bordeaux-Rodez Ligue 2 match abandoned after fan attacks player
description: Bordeaux's hopes of promotion from Ligue 2 are in doubt after their final match of the season was abandoned after a Rodez player was attacked by a fan.

title: Blackhorse Lane Atelier: London's only craft jeans factory
description: Blackhorse Lane Atelier, in east London, is trying to preserve manufacturing skills in the capital.

title: India train crash: ‘I survived but many died around me’
description: The BBC spoke to local villagers and a passenger, who witnessed the train crash in Odisha.

title: Utah primary schools ban Bible for 'vulgarity and violence'
description: The ban followed a parental complaint that the book has content unsuitable for children.

title: Biden says debt ceiling deal averted 'economic collapse'
description: The US president pledges to sign the package into law on Saturday after it cruised through Congress.
